Tune Into Piano Radio

Pianoforce’s live piano internet streaming, presented for the first time at the NAMM show 2008, is now on “air”.

More
No library is needed any longer when pianoradio can provide you with an endless number of songs from original artists that are accompanied by your original piano. Pianoforce has created a music program especially for its performance users so just sit back, relax and listen to your own radio concert in the privacy of your own home.
Ask Pianoforce for your Pianoradio activation CD for your Performance Player system.
Player Piano Meets iPhone

Pianoforce introduces a brand new way of controlling your player piano entertainment. By using Apples popular communication devices iPod Touch or iPhone as a pocket size, wireless remote, operating your Performance Player System has become easier and more comfortable.

More
By installing the Pianoforce iPackage you can enjoy the user friendly touch controls and colorful graphic interface to navigate your way through the functions. Simply download the software application “Pianoforce Remote” free of charge from your iTunes App Store and you’re ready to go.
Stars & Tracks piano music library

The Stars & Tracks piano music library is now counting almost 60 popular titles and new ones are being added on a regular basis. Contact us for more info at support@pianoforce.eu

Open Standard for Piano Performance recording

Pianoforce is actively working on a draft of Open Standard for Piano Performance recording and reproduction (OSPR). The main goal is to set a common public and documented standard which will provide ultimate recording precision, reproduction fidelity and vendors interoperability.

More
If are you a music publisher, player piano hardware manufacturer or musician actively involved in production of musical content for player pianos and wish to participate in the working group, please register to have access to the Open Standard Format Portal . The participation is free, and once the Standard is finished, it will be made public.
